subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Pacers shot 60 percent in the first half before Thunder Coach Scott Brooks delivered a message to his team at halftime. His players responded by limiting Indiana to 33 percent in the second half.
snippet: The Pacers shot 60 percent in the first half before Thunder Coach Scott Brooks delivered a message to his team at halftime. His players responded by limiting Indiana to 33 percent in the second half.
